drupalNodeEvent.title: Climate Change- can the U.S. and China collaborate?

field_speakers.processed: Jennifer Turner (Woodrow Wilson Center), Qi Ye (Tsinghua University), Frederick Mayer (University of Denver), Yongsheng Zhang (Chinese Academy of Social Sciences), Suisheng Zhao (University of Denver)

field_organizers.processed: US Heartland China Association, the Carter Center, University of Denver Josef Korbel School of International Studies

field_description.processed: Given the recent developments around climate change collaboration between the U.S. and China, we will gather top experts from both countries to explore - what next? Can the U.S. and China collaborate?
